text: The Damned (Italian title: La caduta degli dei, lit. "The Fall of the Gods") is a 1969 Italian German Liechtenstein drama movie directed by Luchino Visconti and starring Dirk Bogarde, Ingrid Thulin, Helmut Griem, Helmut Berger, Renaud Verley, Umberto Orsini, Charlotte Rampling. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1970 and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * Category:1969 drama movies Category:1960s LGBT movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Italian LGBT movies Category:German drama movies Category:German LGBT movies Category:Liechtenstein movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Luchino Visconti
title: The Damned (1969 movie)
